channel.title: [PI] Once again, java hates me
channel.description:
Am i stupid or something?[code=java]com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '. '13034436' at line 1 at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.getInstance(Util.java:381) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:1030) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:956) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:3536) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:3468) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1957) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:2107) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.java:2642) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.execSQL(ConnectionImpl.java:2571) at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.java:769) at com.mysql.jdbc.StatementImpl.execute(StatementImpl.java:612) at server.util.HiscoresHandler.saveHiscores(HiscoresHandler.java:86) at server.util.HiscoresHandler.hiscoresHandler(HiscoresHandler.java:71) at server.model.players.Client.logout(Client.java:1176) at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processPacket(ClickingBu ttons.java:1522) at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:1 42) at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1724) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:199) at server.Server.main(Server.java:167)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Once again, java hates me
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Fixed it. Had an unclosed string in my Hiscores that my compiler did not pick up.
